nodes.text: Droids, Technology and the Force: A Clash of Phenomena

Droids, Technology and the Force: A Clash of Phenomena was an essay by Jedi Knight Tam Azur-Jamin on the emergence of technology and the Force, focusing in particular on a group of Shard Jedi known as the Iron Knights.

The article was written by Abel G. Peña for StarWars.com's Hyperspace section published March 2005. It is written from the in-universe perspective of a Jedi Knight, and Peña is listed as "translator" rather than author.
